MongoDB World 2018 highlights:
MongoDB Server 4.0 General Availability, including:
Multi-document ACID transactions
Type conversions in the aggregation pipeline
Non-blocking secondary reads (WiredTiger only, get off MMAP, pretty please!)
MMAP is marked as deprecated storage engine and will be removed in a future version of MongoDB.
Various driver releases supporting MongoDB 4.0. Don‚Äôt forget to update your driver before you upgrade your MongoDB Server!
Public beta of MongoDB Charts.
Enhanced MongoDB Compass with the aggregation pipeline builder.
MongoDB Mobile (iOS, Android) - currently in beta.
MongoDB Stitch is generally available - Functions & Triggers, QueryAnywhere, mobileSync coming soon.
MongoDB Atlas: Global Clusters, Free Tier on GCP, Enterprise Security Features, including encryption key management, LDAP integration, and granular database auditing.
A beta of the MongoDB Enterprise Operator for Kubernetes and OpenShift.
A new, free Cloud Monitoring for MongoDB.
